name: opensync (waynesutton)
description: [项目级] Cloud-synced dashboards for OpenCode and Claude Code. Track sessions, search with semantic lookup, export eval datasets.。来源: https://github.com/waynesutton/opensync

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Cloud-synced dashboards for OpenCode and Claude Code. Track sessions, search with semantic lookup, export eval datasets.

来源: https://github.com/waynesutton/opensync
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 300

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md.md
LICENSE
ONE-CLICK-DEPLOY.md
README.md
changelog.md
convex

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
| Feature                                                 | Description                                    |
| ------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| [Sync](https://www.opensync.dev/docs#hosted-features)   | Sessions sync in real time as you work         |
| [Search](https://www.opensync.dev/docs#search)          | Full text, semantic, and hybrid search         |
| [Private](https://www.opensync.dev/docs#auth)           | Your data stays in your account                |
| [Tag](https://www.opensync.dev/docs#dashboard-evals)
